title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button in the Navigator view moves down when the view is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127. This issue does not occur on build 20011116 on Windows 2000.
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux, the close button moves below the label.
EB: The close button in the Navigator view should remain aligned with the label when the view is resized smaller on Linux.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Navigator view. 
2. Resize the view to make it smaller. 
3. Observe that the close button moves below the label.
